name: Bela Vista Service Residence

reviews.text: Not really near anything but nice quiet neighborhood. The rooms are clean but the bathrooms are not big on the amenities. The towels are small and you only get one, bath and hand towel. The resturaunt is ok for a quick breakfast but service is slow.
reviews.title: Nice clean, quiet

reviews.text: very good option not so close to Porto Alegre's downtown. Quiet and residential neighborhood, I went there because my friend who i was visiting lives close to it, so that's why i choose it! Very clean and large room, good bathroom/shower, friendly staff, good breakfast included.
reviews.title: Nice clean hotel, quiet neighborhood, good value

reviews.text: I've spent here more than one month and I found this residence the right compromise for a long stay ... If u like the residence apartment something like Marriott in USA
reviews.title: Nice residence

aka: Bela Vista Service Residence Porto Alegre, Brazil
